sentences.en: Chairman Mao famously declared that women hold up half the sky and, superficially at least, went about promoting women into jobs previously designated to men.
sentences.cn: 毛主席曾宣称，“妇女能顶半边天”，至少在表面上，促使女性进入了以前只有男人才能干的岗位。

sentences.en: Even the east's superficially good statistics often hide grave weaknesses.
sentences.cn: 就连东德表面良好的统计数字也常常掩盖着严重的缺陷.

sentences.en: He combined consummate shrewdness with the disposition superficially to fraternize.
sentences.cn: 他把高度的精明和温和敦厚的外表结合了起来.

sentences.en: Hill cannot write badly or superficially; his characters and plotting are, as usual, admirable.
sentences.cn: 希尔不可能写得太差，也不会缺乏深度；他刻画的人物和情节和以前一样精彩。

sentences.en: Looking at It'superficially, it is a good deal for the three parties.
sentences.cn: 表面看来, 这是三方获利的好事.

sentences.en: Ms Merkel has problems of a different kind, at least superficially.
sentences.cn: 默克尔的问题是另一种类型, 至少表面上如此.

sentences.en: Narcissists aren't just attractive to themselves. They are, at least superficially, attractive to other people.
sentences.cn: 自恋者不只是对自己有吸引力。至少从表面上看，他们对其他人也有吸引力。

sentences.en: Reviewers'comments were sometimes dealt with only superficially, if not ignored altogether.
sentences.cn: 有时,评论家的评论不是整个被忽略, 就是表面应付一下.

sentences.en: Superficially there have been many changes in Britain in recent years.
sentences.cn: 近几年来英国的面貌发生了很多变化。

sentences.en: Superficially, rendering is not difficult, but actually, it is far from easy.
sentences.cn: 翻译工作看起来简单, 做起来却不容易.

sentences.en: Superficially, this kind of individualism is completely different from the traditional music.
sentences.cn: 从表面来看, 这种个性化与传统的音乐相比已面目全非.

sentences.en: Superficially, this Shakespeare's work seems to fit into the same genre.
sentences.cn: 从表面上看, 莎士比亚的这个剧本似乎属于同一类型.

sentences.en: The film touches on these difficult questions, but only superficially.
sentences.cn: 这部电影触及了这些难题，但只是蜻蜓点水式的。

sentences.en: The film touches on these issues, but only superficially.
sentences.cn: 这部电影涉及了这些问题，但却流于表面。
他们的经历从表面看很相似.

sentences.en: Therapeutics is considered in virtually all textbooks of medicine, but often superficially.
sentences.cn: 事实上所有内科学教科书都提到治疗说, 不过内容通常较为简浅而已.

sentences.en: They were doubtlessly the animating principle of many hours that superficially seemed vacant.
sentences.cn: 在表面看来无所事事的许多时刻中,它们无疑是活跃的因素.
